thread.title: 'Gold digger' Ferne McCann slammed over materialistic antics on Celebs Go Dating: 'She's so shallow!'
thread.title_full: 'Gold digger' Ferne McCann slammed over materialistic antics on Celebs Go Dating: 'She's so shallow!'

author: Nicola Agius
title: 'Gold digger' Ferne McCann slammed over materialistic antics on Celebs Go Dating: 'She's so shallow!'
text:
Ferne McCann has been branded a "gold digger". 
The former TOWIE star is currently taking part in this series of Celebs Go Dating. 
But it seems viewers aren't impressed with her attitude towards the potential suitors. 
Last night, she seriously ruffled feathers by expecting her date to cough up Â£170 for dinner and not offering to contribute. Ferne McCann has been branded a 'gold digger' (Photo: E4) 
She even boasted afterwards that she often forgets to take her purse when men take her out. 
In this evening's episode when the show's professional matchmakers addressed her financial expectations, Ferne burst into tears. 
However, seconds later when she found out she was next going on a date with a rich banker called Luke, the tears stopped and her eyes lit up. Read More Ferne McCann left crying with embarrassment as she's rejected by guy for Jorgie Porter on Celebs Go Dating 
Those tuning in at home were quick to blast the reality beauty for being shallow. The former TOWIE star was delighted upon hearing she'd been paired up with a rich banker (Photo: E4) 
Taking to Twitter, one wrote: "I used to like @fernemccann but now she just seems like a total gold digger!! Stuck up since her nose job #CelebsGoDating #Ferne #GoldDigger." 
Another then added: "HATE to say it but Ferne McCann is coming across as a bit of a gold digger! You can't only want to date a man as he's rich! #CelebsGoDating." Ferne is trying to find love on Celebs Go Dating (Photo: E4) 
Moments later, a different viewer wrote: "@CelebsGoDating again really liked ferne in the jungle omg she being very shallow why doesnt she just say she wants someone with money." 
Shortly afterwards, another tweeted: "FFS Ferne...like the commentator said youre all about the money luv, just a gold digger looking for a lavish lifestyle!! #CelebsGoDating." 
*Celebs Go Dating returns to E4 tomorrow at 10pm Like us on Facebook
